title: Onboarding Completion with Data Persistence
description: Verify that new users can complete the multi-step onboarding wizard within 90 seconds, with data persistence across page refreshes and correct routing to diagnostic or plan start.

steps.description: Navigate to the onboarding start page
Complete age consent step correctly
Set valid test date
Select accommodations from available options
Set personal goals and preferred study window
Configure notification preferences
Set accessibility options including reduced motion and dyslexia font
Choose learning mode (diagnostic or direct plan start)
Refresh page midway through onboarding
Verify all inputs persist after page refresh
Complete onboarding flow
Confirm automatic routing to diagnostic test or study plan start page
Measure onboarding completion time is under 90 seconds

title: Diagnostic Assessment Flow and Personalized Study Plan Generation
description: Ensure diagnostic test completes successfully in about 30 minutes, results display with per-section and overall scores, and a personalized 7-day study plan is generated with scheduled reviews.

steps.description: Start diagnostic assessment after onboarding completion
Answer all diagnostic questions within time limits
Verify diagnostic results display for each test section
Verify overall diagnostic score is calculated and shown
Confirm generation and display of personalized 7-day study plan based on weak areas
Check scheduling of follow-up review items per spaced repetition logic

title: Daily Drills Answer Persistence and Review Queue
description: Validate daily untimed drills retain answers across page refreshes, provide explanations for each question, and enqueue incorrectly answered questions for spaced repetition review mode.

steps.description: Navigate to daily drills for a selected weak subject or skill
Answer multiple drill questions
Refresh the drill page
Verify all answers persist after page reload
View explanations for each answered question
Complete the drill session
Confirm that incorrectly answered questions are added to review queue

title: Timed Section Simulator Functionality and Autosave
description: Verify timed ACT section simulator loads content correctly, shuffles answer choices, persists answers and timer state through refresh, applies accommodations multipliers accurately, provides mid-section resume, and calculates final score with detailed summary.

steps.description: Start a timed section simulation with user accommodations applied
Validate that answer choices are shuffled per question
Answer several questions in the section
Refresh the page mid-section
Verify answers persist after refresh
Verify timer resumes at correct adjusted time after refresh
Complete the timed section
Confirm final scoring is correct consistent with answers
Display detailed summary including timing and scoring per question

title: Full ACT Test Simulation with Section Pausing and Resume
description: Test the full test simulation process with back-to-back ACT sections, ability to pause and resume each section, and correct per-section result reporting consistent across sessions.

steps.description: Begin full ACT test simulation
Complete first section partially and pause
Close and reopen application, resume test
Confirm test resumes at exact paused point with answers and timer preserved
Finish all sections back-to-back
Ensure each section's results are correctly calculated and displayed
Verify aggregate test results summary is accurate

title: Spaced Repetition Review Mode Scheduling and Feedback
description: Ensure review mode presents due review items according to spaced repetition intervals, shows previous attempts and explanations, and allows user feedback to reschedule or mark items as mastered.

steps.description: Open spaced repetition review mode
Verify only review items due for current day are presented
View previous attempt details and explanations for an item
Provide feedback to reschedule the item or mark it as mastered
Confirm item is rescheduled correctly or removed when marked mastered

title: Admin TSV Content Import with Idempotency and Error Handling
description: Verify that only authorized admin users can upload TSV question content, duplicate entries are skipped without side effects, and errors are reported clearly with graceful fallback.

steps.description: Login as a non-admin user and attempt to access admin import interface
Confirm access is denied
Login as authorized admin user
Upload a well-formed TSV file with new question data
Confirm content is imported successfully
Upload the same TSV file again
Confirm duplicates are skipped and no duplicate content is created
Upload a malformed TSV file
Verify clear error message is shown and import fails gracefully

title: Dashboard Load Performance and Accurate Progress Metrics
description: Confirm that dashboard loads within 1 second on repeat visits using cached data and displays accurate real-time progress metrics including accuracy, streaks, XP counters, and recommended next actions.

steps.description: Login and load dashboard for first time
Verify all progress metrics and actionable items load correctly
Navigate away and return to dashboard
Confirm dashboard load time is under 1 second using cached data
Validate displayed metrics are accurate based on user data

title: Row-Level Security Enforcement and Cross-User Data Isolation
description: Validate strict enforcement of row-level security policies to prevent any cross-user data access including negative tests with unauthorized direct API attempts.

steps.description: Login as User A and access own data through UI
Confirm User A data access is successful
Attempt to access User B's data via UI or direct API calls as User A
Verify access is denied at row-level, with no leakage of User B's data
Run automated negative security tests for RLS policy bypass attempts
All bypass attempts are rejected and logged

title: Accessibility Compliance Across Key User Interfaces
description: Ensure all core pages and components comply with accessibility standards including keyboard navigation support, ARIA labels presence, and toggles for reduced motion and dyslexia-friendly fonts.

steps.description: Navigate through onboarding, drills, simulations, and dashboard using keyboard only
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard
Confirm appropriate ARIA roles and labels are present on important UI elements
Enable reduced motion toggle
Verify animations and transitions are minimized or disabled
Enable dyslexia font toggle
Confirm fonts update to dyslexia-friendly styling

title: Error Handling and Fallback UI Display
description: Verify comprehensive error handling across the app with proper display of fallback UIs for loading failures, data retrieval errors, and empty states in all primary modules.

steps.description: Simulate network failure loading dashboard
Verify fallback UI indicating loading failure is displayed
Simulate empty data state in drills or review mode
Verify user-friendly empty state message and options are shown
Inject server error during admin TSV import
Confirm error is captured and error boundary UI is shown

title: Offline Support and Queued Answer Syncing
description: Test offline mode by disconnecting network during drills and simulations, verify answers queue up locally, and upon reconnection, answers sync correctly to backend without loss.

steps.description: Go offline on device
Answer several drill questions or simulation section items
Verify answers queue locally and can be reviewed offline
Reconnect network
Confirm queued answers sync seamlessly to backend and reflect in user progress

title: Parent Portal Read-Only Access and Data Accuracy
description: Ensure parent users have secure read-only access to student progress and reports, with accurate data displayed and no ability to modify student data.

steps.description: Login as parent account linked to student
Verify access to student progress dashboard and reports is permitted
Confirm data accuracy matching student's own dashboard
Attempt to edit any student data or settings in parent portal
Verify no modification controls available and edits are prevented

title: Strict TypeScript Compliance and Test Coverage
description: Validate that the codebase compiles with zero TypeScript errors and all features have comprehensive unit and integration test suites with passing results.

steps.description: Run full TypeScript compile check
Confirm zero TypeScript errors present
Execute entire unit and integration testing suite
Verify coverage is comprehensive across key modules and all tests pass
